article_title: Our View: Cruz accomplished plenty, none of it good

article_metadata.description: The GOP has its candidate, but before shifting gears, it’s worth taking a look at the departure of Sen. Ted Cruz from the race, and the last vestiges of hope for an alternative to Donald Trump with him.Now that we’ve gotten here, it feels like we’ve been through the looking glass. Sen. Cruz had become what Republicans had to accept as the “establishment” candidate (Ohio Gov. John Kasich ended his campaign Wednesday, as well, but in a race among three
